parameters: This thing's made quite the wreck... Look at all these boxes.
Yeah, just look at the bite marks on that one.
Y'all, look, it's right up ahead!
I think I'm going to vomit.
Damn! It really just left us here to babysit!
No... do not refer to those things as "babies." Just don't do that.
Don't worry, guys. I got this.
But it is so worth it...
Wow, you... sure can eat a lot!
Oh yeah, that's right! You haven't seen her eat yet! It's pretty
crazy to see in action, isn't it?
I smell pie above us. And I think I can fit just a lil bit more in
You sure can pack it away...
Well, I'm filling up for sure, but I can keep going! Just let me...
Oh yeah, THAT did the trick.

Did Gregg ever do the dishes? This question will remain in the back
of your mind for a while.
There's no bite marks on this one. It seems to have just fallen down
